title: Will Smith: Fresh Prince to Fallen King | The Pursuit of Happyness | 2
description:
Things are finally falling into place for the Fresh Prince. With a hit new sitcom and budding movie career, life is looking up. But when he meets the woman of his dreams, Will has to make sure his need for control doesn’t derail the love of his life.
